name: Ice Road Truck Race
description:
Get ready for our new off road journey game referred to as Ice Road Truck Race. Here in this game you will be tested and we tend to challenge your driving skills and check them to the easy lay with this Off road Trip. Your aim in this game is to drive this heavy off-road Half Truck to wherever you are required to.There will be a pointer on the screen to guide you to the desired locations.This is your mission.
Good luck and rejoice.
Features:
* Beautiful Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
* Real Life Animations And Physics
